sci-desc: Manage citation resources with the help of [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org Semantic MediaWiki]
sci-scite-parser-not-enabled-namespace: #scite can not be used on a namespace that is not enabled for Semantic MediaWiki
sci-scite-parser-no-type: #scite was unable to determine a reference type for "$1".
sci-scite-parser-no-citation-text: #scite could not render a citation text for reference "$1" because type "$2" was not assigned to a [[MediaWiki:Sci-template-definition|template]].
sci-datavalue-empty-reference: The citation reference is expected not to be empty.
sci-datavalue-invalid-id-value: "$1" is an invalid value for the $2 type.
sci-metadata-search-has-match: The ID has been matched to the following [$1] citation resources.
sci-metadata-search-cached: The search response was fetched from cache.
sci-metadata-search-intro: Please enter an identifier and select a service provider (requires an active internet connection) to map retrievable metadata to the #scite format.
sci-metadata-search-intro-pubmed: [[Property:PMCID|PMCID]] for PubMed Central and [[Property:PMID|PMID]] for the PubMed archive
sci-metadata-search-intro-ol: [[Property:OLID|OLID]] or ISBN number to match an OpenLibrary record
sci-metadata-search-intro-viaf: [[Property:VIAF|VIAF]] number to search for a Virtual International Authority File
onoi-remi-request-error: The REST/HTTP request returned with "$1" for "$2".
onoi-remi-response-empty: The response returned with an empty result for "$1".
onoi-remi-parser-no-id-match: The parser was unable to match "$1".
sci-tooltip-citation-lookup-failure: Failed to retrieve an appropriate citation from the back-end for "$1".
sci-tooltip-citation-lookup-failure-mult: Failed to retrieve a citation text for "$1" which has multiple matches.
sci-property-definition: A list of #scite identifiers that are mapped to user-defined properties. Please be aware that changes to existing entries require a rebuild of property assignments. foo-id|bar-property
sci-template-definition:
A list of citation types that are mapped to predefined templates containing citation formatting rules. 
 foo-type|bar-template
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_cite_key: "$1" is a predefined property that identifies a citation resource and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Cite Semantic Cite] extension.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_cite_ref: "$1" is a predefined property that identifies a citation resource when used as reference (e.g. in-text reference) and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Cite Semantic Cite] extension.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_cite_tex: "$1" is a predefined property that contains a preformatted text and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Cite Semantic Cite] extension.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_cite: "$1" is a predefined property provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Cite Semantic Cite] extension that describes all elements of a citation and is stored as subobject.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_doi: "$1" is a predefined property provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Cite Semantic Cite] extension that represents a Digital Object Identifier.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_pmcid: "$1" is a predefined property provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Cite Semantic Cite] extension that represents a PubMed Central reference number (PMCID) and links to full-text papers in PubMed Central.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_pmid: "$1" is a predefined property provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Cite Semantic Cite] extension that represents a PubMed ID of an entity and is different from the [[Property:PMCID|PMCID]].
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_oclc: "$1" is a predefined property provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Cite Semantic Cite] extension that identifies bibliographic records stored with WorldCat (OCLC).
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_olid: "$1" is a predefined property provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Cite Semantic Cite] extension that identifies OpenLibrary records.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_viaf: "$1" is a predefined property provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Cite Semantic Cite] extension that identifies a Virtual International Authority File.
